npc_output: I'm a thief, nice to meet you.
I love music, it's my passion as a bard.
Farming is going well, thanks for asking.
I can heal you, let me just prepare the ritual |r1|.
My name is Mrs. Madison Martinez, and I'm a priest.
Actually, I could use some help gathering herbs for my remedies.
I'm not interested in buying anything right now, thanks.
I can preach, it's part of my duties as a priest |r2|.
I love fishing, it's one of my favorite hobbies.
I have some goods for sale, let me show you what I have.
